title: Principle Studios
description: Architect and lead developer for a four portal platform for First American, using React, Typescript, React Hooks, and React Query with a C#/.NET backend. This project included a major refactor from Angular 1.x, and I coded a majority of the Homeowner and Marketing portal, as well as parts of the Real Estate and Contractor Portal. This role involved prioritizing with the Product Owner to strategize on complex projects and technical integrations; Negotiate scope, assess impact of changes and mitigate risks in order to deliver successfully on schedule.

title: Stackpath
description: Offering a cutting-edge platform for securing and delivering applications and websites, StackPath is a leading provider of edge computing services. I was responsible for the development of the customer portal, which allows users to manage their accounts, view analytics, and configure security settings. I also added websockets to their analytics dashboard to provide real-time data updates.

carousel.caption: Implimented real-time analytics using websockets on Apollo Server
Added new features and servers to existing network

title: Intuit
description: Served as interim team lead during multiple reorgs. Built microapplications and pages that were used across the Intuit ecosystem, primarily for ProConnect Tax Online, a SaaS for accountants with small to medium size clientele. I worked heavily on the Intuit Link platform which allowed users to send and receive documents, scan and upload documents, and sign documents electronically.

title: Copart
description: Even with React Native being in its infancy, I was able to build a mobile app that allowed users to search for vehicles, view photos, and place bids. I implemented a new search feature that allows users to search for vehicles by make, model, and year.

carousel.caption: Built a new version of the Copart website using React, Redux, and Node.js
Implemented a new search feature that allows users to search for vehicles by make, model, and year
